name: bfc-website
description: - `index.html` homepage - `inspections.html` aircraft inspection services page - `fleet.html` passenger fleet page (ERJ145 + Hawker 400XP) - `contact.html` contact page - `assets/css/` tokenized styling and animation layers - `assets/js/site.js` nav, reveal effects, validation, and form submission - `assets/media/` placeholder visuals for hero/fleet
